text: Children that are raised in a home with a married mother and father consistently do better in every measure of well-being than their peers who come from divorced or step-parent, single-parent, cohabiting homes.
author: Todd Tiahrt

text: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship.
author: Laura Schlessinger

text: Loving a child doesn't mean giving in to all his whims to love him is to bring out the best in him, to teach him to love what is difficult.
author: Nadia Boulanger

text: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.
author: Frank A. Clark

text: My mother protected me from the world and my father threatened me with it.
author: Quentin Crisp
